name: local-ai-interface

scripts.build: electron-packager . local-ai-interface --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=./favicon.ico --out=dist --prune=true --version-string.CompanyName="SaviorNT" --version-string.FileDescription="Local AI Interface" --version-string.ProductName="Local AI Interface" --version-string.ProductVersion="1.0.0" --executableName="Local AI Interface"
scripts.build-all: docker compose -p ai-stack up -d && npm run build

author: SaviorNT
description: Desktop application built with Electron that provides a user interface for managing AI services like Ollama and n8n.
